00019 class FCDocument;
00020 class FCDEntityInstance;
00021 class FCDExtra;
00022 class FCDPhysicsModel;
00023 class FCDPhysicsModelInstance;
00024 
00025 typedef fm::pvector<FCDPhysicsModelInstance> FCDPhysicsModelInstanceList;
00026 typedef FUObjectContainer<FCDPhysicsModelInstance> FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer;
00027 
00028 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsScene : public FCDEntity
00029 {
00030 private:
00031     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntity);
00032     FMVector3 gravity;
00033     float timestep;
00034     FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer instances;
00035 
00036 public:
00037     FCDPhysicsScene(FCDocument* document);
00038     virtual ~FCDPhysicsScene();
00039 
00040     // Returns the entity type
00041     virtual Type GetType() const { return PHYSICS_SCENE_NODE; }
00042     
00043     FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer& GetInstances() { return instances; }
00044     const FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer& GetInstances() const { return instances; }
00045     size_t GetNumInstances() const { return instances.size(); };
00046     FCDPhysicsModelInstance* GetInstance(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < GetNumInstances(), return NULL); return instances.at(index); }
00047     const FCDPhysicsModelInstance* GetInstance(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < GetNumInstances(), return NULL); return instances.at(index); }
00048     FCDPhysicsModelInstance* AddInstance(FCDPhysicsModel* model = NULL);
00049 
00050     // Visibility parameter
00051     const FMVector3& GetGravity() const { return gravity; }
00052     void SetGravity(FMVector3& _gravity) { gravity = _gravity; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00053     const float& GetTimestep() const { return timestep; }
00054     void SetTimestep(float _timestep) { timestep = _timestep; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00055 
00056     // Clones the physics scene
00057     virtual FCDEntity* Clone(FCDEntity* clone = NULL, bool cloneChildren = false) const;
00058 
00059     // Parse a <physics_scene> node from a COLLADA document
00060     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* sceneNode);
00061 
00062     // Write out a <physics_scene> element to a COLLADA XML document
00063     void WriteToNodeXML(xmlNode* node) const;
00064     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00065 };
